objectives.objective: Create a new theme file that integrates table and matrix style presets from the template source.
Ensure matrix presets map to `pivotTable` visual styles and table presets map to `tableEx` visual styles.
Verify the integrated theme validates against the schema and preserves Calibri fonts.

steps.step: Identify existing visualStyles entries for `pivotTable` and `tableEx` in the base theme (if any).
Confirm template presets align with catalog-derived naming.

deliverables.deliverable: Integration notes outlining visual types to be merged.

acceptance.criterion: All template presets mapped to their correct visual types.

steps.step: Clone the base theme to `2.Custom Themes/Rainwater Theme v4.1.with-table-matrix.json`.
Merge `pivotTable` and `tableEx` presets from template source into the new file under `visualStyles`.
Ensure existing global styles remain untouched.

acceptance.criterion: New file contains all original theme properties plus table/matrix presets.

steps.step: Validate new theme against the schema using available tooling.
Confirm all fontFamily values within merged presets remain `Calibri`.
Log differences from the base theme referencing the original change log.

acceptance.criterion: Validation report records checks performed and outcomes.
Diff file enumerates merged presets with JSON Pointers.
No validation or font compliance failures.

constraints.constraint: Do not modify the original base theme; create a new file for the integrated output.
Preserve Calibri as the font for all `fontFamily` keys.
Maintain existing Rainwater color palette unless attributes explicitly specify otherwise.

tools.tool: Merge JSON visual style sections with schema awareness.
Validate theme JSON against the schema.
Produce diff artifacts referencing JSON Pointers.

successCriteria.criterion: Integrated theme ready for use with table and matrix presets accessible by name.
Documentation supports future maintenance and auditing.
